cast.name: 里法特·桑贾尔 Ahmet Rıfat Şungar
比伦特·埃敏·亚拉尔 Bülent Emin Yarar

introduction: 入围华沙电影节主竞赛单元。Suna is a teenage athlete who lives with her mother in a mountain village much like the world at large: here, things are run by older men who know it all, environmental destruction looms, and greed beats in most hearts. Suna’s uncle, the village headman, is on the lookout for ways to close his debt. His wife, whom he married by force, keeps eloping only to be found on the outskirts of the village each time. Twelve-year-old Filiz shoots YouTube videos, and feels that “nothing happens in this village!”. But things happen. An imam arrives and he is strange: he forgets the calls to prayer and spends his nights on the mountain. A dead girl is found in the river; conflict around the stone quarry escalates; treasure hunters arrive, and soon there is a dead body with his mouth filled with stones. Suna is the only one with the innocence and the courage to ask: “Who is to tell you what is good? Who is to tell you your path?”.
